en.title: How to Shampoo Your Cat: Proper Washing Techniques, Frequency, and Handling Reluctant Cats
en.content:
Cats are generally self-grooming animals and do not need frequent baths, but long-haired breeds or particularly dirty cats may sometimes require a shampoo.

Bathing Frequency

Short-haired breeds generally do not need baths. For long-haired breeds, once every few months is a good guideline. If your cat is extremely dirty or has skin issues, consult your veterinarian before bathing.

What You Will Need

Cat-specific shampoo (never use human shampoo), a basin, 2 to 3 towels, and a hair dryer. Water temperature should be lukewarm at 36 to 38 degrees Celsius.

Washing Steps

1. Brush thoroughly to remove tangles. 2. Wet the entire body with lukewarm water (avoid the face). 3. Lather the shampoo and wash gently. 4. Rinse thoroughly. 5. Absorb moisture well with towels. 6. Dry with a hair dryer (on low setting, held at a distance).

Socialization at Fuluck Cattery

At Fuluck Cattery, shower and hair dryer training begins at around 60 days of age. Getting kittens accustomed to bathing from an early age ensures that bath time after adoption is stress-free.

zh.title: 猫咪洗澡方法：正确的洗法与频率，以及应对抗拒洗澡的猫咪
zh.content:
猫咪基本上会自己进行毛发清洁，不需要频繁洗澡，但长毛品种或特别脏的情况下可能需要洗澡。

洗澡频率

短毛品种基本不需要洗澡，长毛品种大约几个月洗一次即可。如果猫咪特别脏或有皮肤问题，请咨询兽医后再进行。

需要准备的物品

猫咪专用洗毛液（不可使用人用洗发水）、洗脸盆、2至3条毛巾和吹风机。水温以36至38度的温水为宜。

洗澡步骤

①充分梳理毛发去除打结 ②用温水打湿全身（避开脸部） ③将洗毛液揉出泡沫轻柔清洗 ④充分冲洗干净 ⑤用毛巾彻底吸干水分 ⑥用吹风机吹干（弱风档，保持距离）

福楽猫舍的社会化训练

福楽猫舍从幼猫约60日龄起就开始进行淋浴和吹风机的适应训练。从小习惯洗澡，接回家后洗澡也不会感到压力。
